title: Peptide - magnitude of K for the reaction

content.description: Two molecules of the amino acid glycine join through the formation of a peptide bond, as shown above. The thermodynamic data for the reaction are listed in the following table.
content.question: Based on the thermodynamic data, which of the following is true at 298 K?

skill.text: 5.B: Identify an appropriate theory, definition, or mathematical relationship to solve a problem.
